name: StarScape (itch) (Feca)
description:
Be the first to destroy 2 of your enemy's 3 bases!

-Card Info-

Top left - Credits - How much it costs to play the card.

top right - Health - How much damage a ship can take before destruction.

Bottom left - Speed - How to determine which card will attack first.

Bottom Right - Power - How much damage you deal when you attack.

Border Color - Affinity -  Units deal 25% more damage and take 25% less damage from units they have an affinity advantage over.

Affinity Advantage OverElectric (Blue)Thermal Thermal(Red)Chemical Chemical(Green)Electric Antimatter(Purple)Antimatter

-Abilities-

Slow - Doesn't fire its first turn

Skip - Attack skips the first enemy

- Terms -

Critical hit- Happens 10% of the time you attack. Your unit does 25% more damage than normal. (Green laser beam)

Miss fire - Happens 5% of the time. Your unit does 50% less damage than normal. (Red laser beam)
